summary: Experienced Network Engineer with 6+ years in designing, deploying and maintaining enterprise, ISP and data center networks. Skilled in network architecture (HLD/LLD), vendor ecosystems (HPE, Aruba, Juniper, Cisco including ACI, Huawei, ZTE, Mikrotik), MPLS cores, Python automation, security appliances (BIG-IP F, FortiDDoS, Fortianalyzer; Check Point), Wi-Fi deployments (Aruba, Cisco), WireGuard, PCRF, and deployment planning.
skills: Vendor experience: HPE, Aruba, Juniper, Cisco (ACI), Huawei, ZTE, Mikrotik
Networking across Enterprise, ISP and Data Center

experience.title: Network Engineer / Layer 3 Support
experience.description: Designed, implemented and maintained networks for enterprise and data center environments; produced design documentation (HLDs/LLDs, solution descriptions); configured and managed ISP-like networks with ZTE and Mikrotik; maintained 400+ devices in MPLS core; engaged in network solutions for customer requests.

experience.title: System Administrator
experience.description: Administered BIG-IP F series (Firewalls, FMG, FortiDDoS, Fortianalyzer); supported security infrastructure; configured Wi-Fi analytics on F5; implemented WireGuard; worked with Check Point rules.

experience.title: Network Engineer
experience.description: Network design and deployment for ISP networks; Wi-Fi deployments; configuring and maintaining F5 analytics; building Greenfield deployments; implemented WireGuard; Aruba and Cisco Wi-Fi networks.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Network integration work; automation of monitoring in ISP network with Python; deployment planning, testing and management; design and maintenance of network equipment.

experience.title: Counselor
experience.company: Jewish Agency for Israel in Ukraine
